alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Lafayette; St. Martin; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 16 at 9:18AM CDT until October 16 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern Lafayette Parish in south central Louisiana... Northwestern Iberia Parish in south central Louisiana... Eastern Vermilion Parish in southwestern Louisiana... West central St. Martin Parish in south central Louisiana... * Until 1215 PM CDT. * At 915 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Four to eight inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring and additional rainfall amounts of two to five inches are possible in the warned area. This will result in continued flooding through 1215 PM. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lafayette, New Iberia, Abbeville, Catahoula, Breaux Bridge, St. Martinville, Forked Island, Avery Island, Intracoastal City, Broussard, Youngsville, Erath, Delcambre, Loreauville, Cade, Esther, Acadiana Regional Airport, Jefferson Island, Coteau and Henry.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
